children.description: Question: Could you please specify the country code (e.g., US for the United States) for the country details and list of states you wish to obtain?

To fetch the required information regarding Germany (country code: "DE"), I will:

1. Retrieve the details of the country including its capital, region, and currency.
2. Get the list of states within Germany including their latitude and longitude.

First, I will retrieve detailed information about the country. Starting with fetching the country details for this code.

Germany, with the code "DE", is officially known as "Deutschland". It is located in Western Europe, has Berlin as its capital, and the official currency is the Euro (EUR). Now, I will retrieve a list of states within Germany along with their latitude and longitude.

children.description:
Germany has several states including;

1. Schleswig-Holstein, located at (Latitude: 54.21936720, Longitude: 9.69611670)
2. Baden-Württemberg, located at (Latitude: 48.66160370, Longitude: 9.35013360)
3. Mecklenburg-Vorpommern, located at (Latitude: 53.61265050, Longitude: 12.42959530)
4. Lower Saxony, located at (Latitude: 52.63670360, Longitude: 9.84507660)
5. Bavaria, located at (Latitude: 48.79044720, Longitude: 11.49788950)
6. Berlin, located at (Latitude: 52.52000660, Longitude: 13.40495400)
7. Saxony-Anhalt, and other states in similar formats including their latitude and longitude.

I will now finalize and present this structured answer.

function.name: Finish

2.All the thought is short, at most in 5 sentence.
3.You can do more then one trys, so if your plan is to continusly try some conditions, you can do one of the conditions per try.
